info.name: Gemini API [Use Cases] Copy
info.description: This collection highlights some practical workflows using Gemini APIs, showcasing: - Song commercial generation for a company given its name. - News report generation by converting an old newspaper image into a virtual journalist report. - Interactive US history quiz creation from a textbook, complete with a UI built with Postman Visualization. --- # Getting Started #### Step 1: Fork the Collection Fork the collection manually _or_ use the the Run in Postman button[](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/37708857-7186b24f-c9e0-44f1-a101-99d34a578602?action=collection%2Ffork&source=rip_markdown&collection-url=entityId%3D37708857-7186b24f-c9e0-44f1-a101-99d34a578602%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3D657d27fa-301f-4268-be9d-4e35dfb35d70) #### Step 2: Getting your API key To get started working with Gemini APIs, you must first be authorized to access them. The easiest way to authenticate to the Gemini API is to configure an API key. If you need stricter access controls, you can [use OAuth](https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/oauth) instead. ###### Getting your API key First, navigate to your [API Key page](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey) on your Google AI studio account. Click the Create API key button and select a project when prompted. Copy and keey the generated API key safe. #### Step 3: Configure your API key in Postman using Vaults Postman provides a Vault for storing sensitive data locally. Data stored in this vault is not synced with Postman Cloud and can only be accessed in your local Postman Instance. > We recommend using [Postman Vault](https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/postman-vault/postman-vault-secrets/) to store sensitive data. Store your Secret Key in a Postman Vault. A reference to a secret `{{vault:`apiKey`}}` has been added to the [collection authorization tab](https://www.postman.com/devrel/openai/collection/k25n3c8/chatgpt-api?tab=authorization) as a Bearer token. You can use this variable name in your vault or update the variable in the authorization tab accordingly. --- --- # Ask for help We want you to get the best support possible when working with this workspace. If you're stuck and need help with specific Gemini issues, we recommend that you explore the following channels. - [Gemini Developer Forum](https://discuss.ai.google.dev/c/gemini-api/4) For Postman specific questions or feedback about this workspace: - [Postman's Community Forum](https://community.postman.com/t/ai-provider-workspaces-and-collections/74143) - Provide feedback and ask questions about this workspace, ask general Postman questions, understand how to use a feature, how to build a workflow, etc. For Postman specific issues: - [Postman Github Issues](https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-app-support) - Submit feature requests, bug reports, etc here
